#  file: rfProjDesc2010-May.txt
#  package: rfRawData
#  description of file/package:
#
#  This package includes raw data files from our database of RubyForge project 
#  information generated from the list of projects gathered in 2010-May
#
#  Raw html data was inserted into database by running our java-based Rubyforge 
#  spidering program based on the libraries at ossmole.sf.net in our CVS tree.
#  This html data was then parsed and scraped to extract interesting facts.
#
#  Scripts & raw data available at http://flossmole.org
#  Scripts written by Megan Squire and contributed to the FLOSSmole project
#
#  This data is free and available for any use (after all we just spidered it ;)
#  We do however request that those using the data in any published form provide 
#  a citation to: FLOSSmole Project (2004-2010) 
#  The project is available at: http://flossmole.org
#
#  SELECT proj_unixname, description, date_collected, datasource_id
#  FROM rf_project_description
#  WHERE datasource_id=219
#  ORDER BY proj_unixname
#
#  datasource_id = 219 is the 2010-May run on Rubyforge.

proj_unixname	description	date_collected	datasource_id
aaa-openid	An out-of-the-box plugin for apps that use OpenID exclusively for authentication. This plugin is based on acts_as_authenticated and DHH's open_id_authentication plugin.\n   	2010-05-03 14:58:19	219
aaap	acts_as_amazon_product makes it extremely simple to add Amazon integration to an existing Rails model.  It does not require changing any existing database tables, but does add one new table to cache Amazon responses.\n   	2010-05-03 14:58:21	219
aaar	Generate and customize a list type report of changes to an AR object. The report is available after an update as an instance variable on the object and assumes nothing about what to do with the it. Save it, log it, discard it...it's up to you!\n   	2010-05-03 14:58:30	219
aabytefield	An ActiveRecord based plugin to turn a string column into a bytefield.\n   	2010-05-03 14:58:18	219

aamm	Acts as metamodel add dynamic flexibility to a model by enabling virtual attributes extracted from a description in a database table.\n   	2010-05-03 14:58:24	219
